page.title: 03Park St. Infants Biographies
page.content:
My name is Mark Baines.Iwas born in Liverpool.When I was three years old I moved to Wales.We live in Abergavenny My dad works for Burtons Biscuits.I like living in Wales because there are mountains and I like to climb them.
********************* My name is John Moore.Iused to live in a town in Staffordshire.I went to St. Laurence's school,my teacher's name was Mrs Evans.We used to sing lots of songs We moved to Cwmbran for half a year and I went to St. Dials.Daddy works in County Hall,he works with plans.Then we moved to Abergavenny.I like the park in Abergavenny and the Sugar Loaf.
